Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: usamen bas vahee daakhil hoga jo bada badabakht hai
jisane jhuthalaaya aur munh pher liya aur jo bada parahezagaar hai
vah usase bacha liya jaega
jo apana maal (khuda kee raah) mein deta hai taaki paak ho jae
aur lutph ye hai ki kisee ka us par koee ehasaan nahin jisaka use badala diya jaata hai
balki (vah to) sirph apane aaleeshaan paravaradigaar kee khushanoodee haasil karane ke lie (deta hai)
aur vah anaqareeb bhee khush ho jaega
(ai rasool) pahar din chadhe kee qasam
aur raat kee jab (cheezon ko) chhupa le
ki tumhaara paravaradigaar na tumako chhod baitha aur (na tumase) naaraaz hua
aur tumhaare vaaste aakherat duniya se yaqeenee kaheen behatar hai
aur tumhaara paravaradigaar anaqareeb is qadar ata karega ki tum khush ho jao
kya usane tumhen yateem paakar (aboo taalib kee) panaah na dee (zaroor dee)
aur tumako ehakaam se naavaakif dekha to manzile maqasood tak pahuncha diya
aur tumako tangadast dekhakar ganee kar diya
to tum bhee yateem par sitam na karana
maangane vaale ko jhidakee na dena
aur apane paravaradigaar kee neamaton ka zikr karate rahana
(ai rasool) kya hamane tumhaara seena ilm se kushaada nahin kar diya (jaroor kiya)
aur tum par se vah bojh utaar diya
jisane tumhaaree kamar tod rakhee thee
aur tumhaara zikr bhee buland kar diya
to (haan) pas beshak dushavaaree ke saath hee aasaanee hai
yaqeenan dushvaaree ke saath aasaanee hai
to jab tum phaarig ho jao to muqarrar kar do
aur phir apane paravaradigaar kee taraph ragabat karo
